Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Encephalopathy has been reported in 10 - 40 % of patients receiving high - dose IV ifosfamide .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Encephalopathy |

Explanation:

* Encephalopathy is the only disease mentioned in the paragraph. It is a condition that affects the brain and can be a side effect of certain treatments, in this case, high-dose IV ifosfamide.
